name: Rites of Control
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Choose from two of the following effects. You can't target a creature or area twice with the same effect, but you can still choose the same effect twice otherwise.
* You brand a target creature or object with an emblem representing a deity, or erase such an emblem.
* You hallow or desecrate a 5 foot radius area. Hallowed areas grant a +1 to all rolls celestials make, while desecrated areas grant a +1 to all rolls undead and reanimated creatures make. These areas tend to attract creatures that would benefit from them.
* You preserve a corpse. It no longer decays.
* You create a phenomenon unique to a deity. It can't deal damage, but it is visually impressive.
* You cause a corpse or reanimated creature to speak up to five words in a language you know.
